trans-unit.source: Provides a structure for reading information about an exception that occurs in a mobile application.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于读取有关移动应用程序中所发生异常的信息的结构。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: This class is internal and used by the adaptive error handling mechanism to encapsulate exception information.
trans-unit.target: 此类为内部，使用的自适应的错误处理机制用来封装异常信息。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />；权限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />。

trans-unit.source: The key to retrieve current exception information from the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.Context" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于从 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.Context" /> 中检索当前异常信息的键。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: Used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ErrorFormatterPage> to retrieve information for a <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileErrorInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ErrorFormatterPage>以检索信息<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileErrorInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a description of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 返回对异常的描述。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: A description of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 异常的说明。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the code file where the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 返回发生异常的代码文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the code file where the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 发生异常的代码文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that uniquely identifies an item in the data store.
trans-unit.target: 唯一标识数据存储区中项的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string value from the internal dictionary or hash table using the given key.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定键从内部字典或哈希表中返回一个字符串值。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: A string value from the internal dictionary or hash table using the given key.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定键从内部字典或哈希表中获取的字符串值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the line number in the code where the exception occurred, if tracing is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用跟踪，则将返回代码中发生异常处的行号。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The line number in the code where the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 代码中发生异常处的行号。

trans-unit.source: Returns an alternate text for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 返回异常的替换文字。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: An alternate text for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 异常的替换文字。

trans-unit.source: Returns an alternate title for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 返回异常的替换标题。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: An alternate title for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 异常的替换标题。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 返回此异常的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 异常的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。
